title: Basic Stat Method
description: Point and interval estimation of systems parameters, statistical decision making about differences in system parameters, analysis and modeling of relationships between variables.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 2027 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
